category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
description: The Man With Ball, Type-6 emoji is a sequence of the ? Person With Ball,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-6, ? Male Sign and ? Variation S
apple_vendor_description: The man bouncing a ball emoji on Apple devices showcases a dynamic figure with dark skin tone caught mid-action, his body angled with energetic momentum. Apple's design imbues him with a sense of playful athleticism, highlighted by the glossy finish and realistic lighting that makes the ball appear to subtly rebound. Its soft rounded edges and smooth gradients give the impression of lively movement, perfect for expressing fun, sports, or active engagement in digital conversations.
